attributes.action: Stop sending money and weapons to Israel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We're ashamed that no-one including you has tried stopping the conflict between Israel and Gaza.Israel are killin innocent civilians and destroying mosques, schools ambulances UN buildings and lots of other things as well.Stop this war, and free everyone of their anger and dissapointment

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
